Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory31.jpg'}
{3: 'The sun is always blinding in the desert. Even the reflections from the metal shards in the sand are bright enough to get people covering their eyes.'}
{3: 'And when it shines on the remnants of destroyed livelihoods, the cruel display is not a sight to behold.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Away from the debris, some people are clothed in robes only. They would have been hiding somewhere shaded on a normal day.'}
{3: 'But the sun is the least of their problems right now. Their gazes focus on one person and one person only.'}
{3: 'He stands on a slightly elevated dune, his expression composed and his voice calm.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Nice to meet you all, good people of Humanity Corp. You probably know me from one of our previous dealings, so let's skip the introduction.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Our camps worked together to defeat all the enemies in the earlier Corrupted attack and successfully resolve this crisis. It was fortunate that we haven't suffered a terrible loss.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But you lost your home in the process—for now. I believe that if our camps work together, it won't take long for us to rebuild your camp.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Because we all know that the resources you need to survive are stored in other warehouses, and you only keep your daily supplies in your camp. That's a very smart thing to do. You have my praise.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Don't worry about the Corrupted destroying or contaminating your resources either. We've sent our people to secure them.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Watanabe's words have not inspired any confidence. The commotion in the crowd clearly expresses their discomfort."}
{3: '"Secure" is just another word for "seize." Years of resources that they have gathered are now Watanabe\'s possession.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I hope this operation will be the catalyst for a deeper partnership between us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'As we said, our camp wants to work with you and build a new base of operation—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camp Member', 3: 'Easy for you to say...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The people are protesting before Watanabe can finish.'}
{2: 'Camp Member', 3: 'We have so many mouths to feed... Even with our resources, we still need to strictly ration our food to make sure everyone survives.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camp Member', 3: 'Work with us? More like steal from us...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I understand your worry. After all, you have been pillaged before, and our camp is constantly lacking food.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'But taking from our teammates will only use up all our resources eventually, no matter how abundant they are.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Which is why we need to work together to restore our past food production.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Now, allow me to introduce one of our new friends.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'This is Theresa, an engineer officer previously employed by Easton Group. She was quite established in the research of compact ration production.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A few sighs later, Theresa makes her way to Watanabe fumblingly with a cane in her hand.'}
{2: 'Theresa', 3: 'No need to bother with the titles...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We've learned from our recent trades that your camp has gathered many technicians with expertise in food production. Between them holds the key to mass-producing food.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Meanwhile, our camp holds the technology to store and distribute food, which gave us the means to be self-sufficient to a certain extent.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But neither is enough. Our technologies are incomplete without the other. Restoring them, however, isn't quick and easy, just like establishing trust.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'We estimate that the recovery of this technology is going to take a long time.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The food processing plants infected by the Punishing Virus will no longer feed us as they did. If all we do is store away the rations from the Golden Age, we will run out of food eventually. Then...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe pauses for a second, but no one interrupts him. Everyone here has more or less thought about this since the day they became a Scavenger.'}
{3: 'Watanabe takes a deep breath.'}
{3: 'When he was still a soldier, a friend in the army who loved history once told him what happened to the people suffering from famine. Some, in the end, committed cannibalism.'}
{3: 'That friend eventually died from starvation after being trapped in a camp for half a month during the Great Evacuation, surrounded by Corrupted with no way out.'}
{3: "When Watanabe arrived as part of a rescue team to save the surviving members, he almost threw up upon seeing his friend's incomplete body."}
{3: 'Watanabe shakes his head and casts the past out of his M.I.N.D. before taking another deep breath again.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'We are seeking your partnership to avoid that future.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The technology Theresa holds is the key to the survival of everyone here. It can be the foundation that sustains more lives in the future.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Let me stress that we are not asking for your compliance. We're looking for a partnership.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'All who stay here, whoever they are, will be supplied with basic needs, and they are expected to contribute to the camp.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'They could be a king sitting on a mountain of gold or a Scavenger struggling to live to see the next sunrise. Everyone will be given what they need to survive.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Rations, greens... things we could just pluck from processing plants must now be painstakingly produced. I know the reason Humanity Corp set up camp here in the middle of the desert was that this was close to an old factory.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'If we form this partnership, we can begin to restore the soil and the laboratories the Corrupted destroyed. We can start recovering lost technology and fill the belly of every single one of us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'One step at a time, we... can build a home on Earth again!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Theresa', 3: '...May I say a few words?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Theresa's voice is quiet but determined. Watanabe moves aside and nods, helping her up to the top of the dune."}
{2: 'Theresa', 3: "Yes... Watanabe was right. I was in charge of the production line of Easton Group's compact ration. I have a fairly comprehensive understanding of the whole technology.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Theresa', 3: "But the truth is... I'm afraid to let other people know about this. I'm afraid of their expectations. I'm scared that they'd expect me... to do something I'm not capable of doing.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Theresa', 3: 'Every time I told people about my past, every camp that took me in treated me like their savior. They called me "Demeter"... but I was just a technician.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Theresa', 3: "Without a proper laboratory and support from engineers, the machines that could turn bark into food and the vegetables that could grow overnight were just theories in my head. I couldn't turn them into reality.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Theresa', 3: 'And so... they were disappointed and treated me as a liar who tricked them for food. I was cast out multiple times.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Theresa', 3: "Even now, I don't dare to make any promises. I will be honest with you—I don't know if this technology will come to fruition even with enough time and support.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Theresa', 3: "But... I'm willing to try. I'll do my best.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Theresa', 3: 'Because... I want to live. I want my child to live... When the mutineers chased me away from the Babylonia shelter, I decided that I must do this...', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Why would you guys trust him?!'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Someone in the crowd protests again. Watanabe looks around but fails to discover where the voice came from.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Theresa', 3: 'Warren! Stop it!', 4: '2'}
{3: "But a mother knows her child best. Following Theresa's gaze, Watanabe also finds Warren among the crowd. He is trying to stand out as he shouts toward the dune."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Warren', 3: "What makes you guys think you can trust him?! He's a Construct... from Babylonia!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Warren', 3: "Who knows why he ended up on Earth? Maybe he'll take the technology back to Babylonia once we restore it! He'll take the army and our food away too!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Warren', 3: "Why would you trust him? How do you know he won't betray this place? How do you know he won't... betray himself?!", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Theresa', 3: "Warren! Now's not the time...!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "—Because I can't.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe takes a step forward and leaps.'}
{3: 'When the dust clears, Watanabe is crouching before Warren, looking into his eyes at the same level.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Everyone here has a reason to keep going.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe sounds as calm as he usually does on the battlefield. He does not sound like an overbearing or patronizing adult, treating the boy before him as his equal.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Do you know what the good folks behind me did?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Some of them gave up their ticket to Babylonia for their loved ones. To keep their unconscious family alive, they work and fight every day to gain the extra supplies they need.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory69.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zachery', 3: 'Brother! Brother!', 4: '1'}
{2: "Zachery's Brother", 3: 'Oh... Zachery?', 4: '2'}
{2: "Zachery's Brother", 3: "Shouldn't you be heading for the ship to Babylonia? Did you forget something?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: "...No, no. I wasn't chosen.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: "They said my engineering skill wasn't useful up there anymore before they threw me off the ship.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'So... I guess I need to stick with you for a little bit longer, Brother.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Zachery's Brother", 3: '...Is that so?', 4: '2'}
{2: "Zachery's Brother", 3: "Heh... Of course you can! We're blood brothers. I've been taking care of you since the outbreak the same way I did when you grew up, anyway.", 4: '2'}
{2: "Zachery's Brother", 3: "Stick with me, and I'll make sure you have food on your plate every night!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: "You're smiling, Brother! Hehe, heh.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Zachery's Brother", 3: "C'mon! I told you to stop laughing like that.", 4: '2'}
{2: "Zachery's Brother", 3: "...Never mind. Today's not the day...", 4: '2'}
{2: "Zachery's Brother", 3: "I got some extra canned food earlier. Let's eat well tonight. Consider it... consolation for not reaching Babylonia today.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'Okay! Thanks, Brother!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory5.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zachery', 3: 'Brother! Brother! Aaaaah!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What the hell are you doing?! Get back here! That giant mechanoid is infected! We can barely contain it—', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'I know! I know! I designed it!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'It killed my brother! It crushed him!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Calm down! That soldier was attacked on quicksand! He may still be alive!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Did you say you designed it?! Good! Tell me its weaknesses. I'll take it down.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Listen... You're going to run into more similar infected machines in the future. They're going to take a lot of lives.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'And you—you can save them... with your knowledge.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I don't know who that soldier is to you, but your expression tells me that you feel like you are holding him back.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But if you save him now, you can at least proudly declare to him that you are the one who saves him with your knowledge. You can prove to him... that you aren't holding him back!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: "Alright, I'll do it.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory31.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Some people have no one left, and they're willing to die for others at any moment. Still, they keep going on in the memories of the loved ones they've lost.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory20.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I've seen people who want to die. I've never seen someone who wants to die work so hard to stay alive.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Anyone who's joining a group has the desire to live, at the very least. Those who don't have long fallen by the side of the road.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But there has never been someone like you who eats and sleeps like everyone else but throws caution to the wind when there's danger.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "...It's none of your business.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Suma', 3: "That's just what my life is worth. Just send me next time if you have another suicide mission. Feel free to leave me behind if you don't have enough food to feed all the mouths.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "I'd love to take down a few more Corrupted on my way to hell, though. I'm only following you folks to make sure no one else ends up like the miserable person I am.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Is that so?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I remember you... You're the demolitionist we rescued from the mechanoid factory, aren't you? Your family was killed in that incident.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "There's no need to rub salt into the wound, captain obvious.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "Save your breath if you're planning to lecture me with your inspirational speech. Everyone dies. No need to get all schmaltzy about it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...Nah. That's your right.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Right? You can see your family again if you die. I understand why that would be preferable.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "On the other hand... no one here will remember your family if you're gone.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Didn't you talk about how much you like ocean life and the sea in the camp? You always asked your family to take you to the Copperfield Aquarium, and they only did it after you scored 100 in your exams a few times.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You even saw Copperfield that day and were moved by his vision. You said you would've been a zoologist if it weren't for the outbreak. Your family supported you and took you to all kinds of zoos, taking photos for all of your visits.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's your choice to reunite with your family, but no one's going to remember any of this when you're gone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Will you pay that price to die alone?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory31.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "And your mother. She keeps going despite everything she's been through just to see your father again.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory69.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Theresa', 3: "Sigh... That's about it...", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Theresa', 3: 'I can\'t blame Babylonia... Who could have guessed that my "cutting-edge technology" would become obsolete so quickly...? I\'m just glad my husband made it to Babylonia with his agricultural engineering research.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Theresa', 3: 'Abandoned us? No... I never thought of it that way. Look at the world we live in. All that matters is he lives.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Theresa', 3: 'But... I still want to see him again...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Theresa', 3: 'I still miss his voice... his face...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Theresa', 3: "I want to talk to him and ask him how he's doing. Is he working overnight the way he did? Is he taking care of himself? Has he made every day count?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Theresa', 3: "That would be enough... I don't ask for much. I just want to know how he is.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Theresa', 3: "I know it's a pipe dream. Warren and I can barely have a warm meal nowadays. How would we even...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Is that so? Is that enough for you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Have you imagined surviving long enough to meet your husband again?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Perhaps you could even use your technology to save more people... people like your son?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory31.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Look. Everyone here has a reason to not give in.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The moment I suggest surrendering to Babylonia... no—the moment I reveal even the slightest hint of compliance, everyone here who has fought so hard to keep going will not hesitate to take me down.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "What about you? What keeps you going? How long will you last if there's nothing to sustain you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'm sorry, son. This isn't the Golden Age. We've seen enough blood and deaths on our way to where we are.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Perhaps you're right. Don't relent, then. Do not give in until you can survive and find the thing that keeps you going. Before that, however, you have to first defeat your hunger.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Warren's expressionless face is as impassive as ever."}
{3: 'But Watanabe can see him clenching his fists before letting go.'}
{2: 'Warren', 3: '...I understand.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Warren', 3: "I'm sorry for questioning you like that.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'm glad you understand. Well, then—", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe stands up and raises his voice.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "If there's anyone who thinks differently, like this boy here, feel free to voice your thoughts. I will talk to every one of you, no matter how many of you there are.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "The tall guy there is Barley. You worked for the World Government and became a lieutenant here after a power struggle. Leia there grew up in the desert. You didn't know about the outside world until the outbreak. And Chelsea...", 4: '1'}
{3: "One by one, Watanabe recounts everyone's story and their journey to this place aloud."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You've come here to live, to die, or to accomplish something you desire.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Whatever your reason is, I want you to be one of us.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'My teammates behind me also came together for different reasons, but we shared the same goal: to build our own home on this planet away from Babylonia. We fight against the Punishing Virus for the survival of humankind!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Therefore, we need more teammates.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You can leave and follow your heart like that boy or bury your desire to survive. But if you join us, we will do our best to safeguard every base!', 4: '1'}
